kreport.name: onwaryBillForGMonitor

condition.name: deptType
condition.extend: select v_o.type from v_org v_o where v_o.area in(${s@user_areas}) group by v_o.type_order,v_o.type order by v_o.type_order

condition.name: deptId
condition.extend: deptType:select v_o.type,v_o.id,v_o.org_name from v_org v_o where v_o.area in(${s@user_areas}) order by v_o.type_order,v_o.org_order

condition.name: area
condition.extend: select d.dvalue,d.dname from sys_data_dictionary d where d.dgroup='区域' order by d.ordernum

kreport.ksql: select o2.org_order 部门序号, o2.org_name 部门, n.executergroupname 处理组, case ${timeType} when 'used' then case when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<4 then 1 when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<8 then 2 when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<12 then 3 when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<24 then 4 when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<72 then 5 else 6 end else case when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000)))<=r.total_time-r.warn_threshold then 0 when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)<0 then 1 when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<4 then 2 when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<8 then 3 when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<12 then 4 when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<24 then 5 when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<72 then 6 else 7 end end 时段序号, case ${timeType} when 'used' then case when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<4 then '0～4小时' when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<8 then '4～8小时' when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<12 then '8～12小时' when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<24 then '12～24小时' when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<72 then '24～72小时' else '72小时以上' end else case when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000)))<=r.total_time-r.warn_threshold then '' when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)<0 then '预警' when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<4 then '0～4小时' when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<8 then '4～8小时' when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<12 then '8～12小时' when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<24 then '12～24小时' when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<72 then '24～72小时' else '72小时以上' end end 时段, sum(decode(n.status,'DT',1,0)) 未签, sum(decode(n.status,'DT',0,1)) 已签 from rec_flow f,ins_frm_fault i,rec_node n,chk_assessment_result r,chk_entity e,sec_org o1,v_org o2 where f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and f.flowlsh=n.flowlsh and f.flowlsh=r.rec_flow_id and n.executergroupid is not null and n.executergrouporgid=o1.id and r.assessment_id=e.assessment_id and f.status!='XJ' and r.assessment_type='O' and e.entiy_id=n.executergrouporgid and n.status in ('DB','DT','SF') and n.nodecode not in('86c9dd900a11226800316ae4eb406c1e','870bb7f90a11226801f8cfbbeebbcb95') and i.replytime is null and o2.area in(${s@user_areas}) and o1.org_code like o2.org_code||decode(o2.org_code,'000110000003','','%') #[and o2.type=${deptType}] #[and o2.id=${deptId}] #[and f.startercode ${startercode}] #[and f.startercode=${type10000}] #[and i.area=${area}] group by o2.org_order,o2.org_name,n.executergroupname, case ${timeType} when 'used' then case when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<4 then 1 when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<8 then 2 when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<12 then 3 when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<24 then 4 when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<72 then 5 else 6 end else case when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000)))<=r.total_time-r.warn_threshold then 0 when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)<0 then 1 when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<4 then 2 when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<8 then 3 when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<12 then 4 when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<24 then 5 when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<72 then 6 else 7 end end, case ${timeType} when 'used' then case when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<4 then '0～4小时' when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<8 then '4～8小时' when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<12 then '8～12小时' when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<24 then '12～24小时' when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<72 then '24～72小时' else '72小时以上' end else case when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000)))<=r.total_time-r.warn_threshold then '' when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)<0 then '预警' when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<4 then '0～4小时' when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<8 then '4～8小时' when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<12 then '8～12小时' when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<24 then '12～24小时' when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<72 then '24～72小时' else '72小时以上' end end having case ${timeType} when 'used' then case when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<4 then 1 when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<8 then 2 when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<12 then 3 when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<24 then 4 when decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))/60<72 then 5 else 6 end else case when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000)))<=r.total_time-r.warn_threshold then 0 when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)<0 then 1 when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<4 then 2 when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<8 then 3 when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<12 then 4 when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<24 then 5 when (decode(r.clock_status,'active',round(r.used_time/60000+(sysdate-r.last_modify)*1440),round(r.used_time/60000))-r.total_time)/60<72 then 6 else 7 end end>0
